value.name: Joe Hernandez
value.description: A flight attendant on a Southwest Airlines plane lost two teeth over the weekend after allegedly being punched by a passenger who had "repeatedly ignored standard inflight instructions," according to an airline spokesman. A dog is found murdered at the hunting club in Cone City, a fictional locale on the central California coast, under the light of a full moon. Then the club's Swedish cook is killed. More deaths follow. New in town, cub reporter "Egg" Waters narrates the story of a series of brutal murders that appear to be the work of a werewolf; an amateur sleuth on the case develops a theory of crime-solving based on the detective fiction he's read.

value.name: 1 Person Shot Near The Site Of George Floyd’s Murder On The Anniversary Of His Death
value.description: Minneapolis Police say the individual's wound is believed to be non-life threatening. Witnesses told police a suspect vehicle left the area "at a high rate of speed."

value.name: Events Planned Across Minneapolis To Mark The Anniversary Of George Floyd's Murder
value.description: Activists, community members, journalists and others are gathering in Minneapolis Tuesday at the site of George Floyd's murder to mark the anniversary

value.name: The FAA Has Seen A "Significantly Higher" Number Of Unruly Passenger Reports In 2021
value.description: With more people boarding planes as the pandemic eases, verbal abuse and violence against flight attendants has increased, caused in part by disputes over the ongoing federal mask mandate.

value.name: Read This Powerful Statement From Darnella Frazier, Who Filmed George Floyd's Murder
value.description: "If it weren't for my video, the world wouldn't have known the truth. I own that," says Frazier, who was 17 at the time. "It made me realize how dangerous it is to be Black in America."
